title: Bloomberg Markets: GOP Appears Annoyed With Trump's Debt Deal
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: GOP Appears Annoyed With Trump's Debt Deal
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Erik Wasson Congressional Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing why conservative House Republicans hissed and groaned at Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin as he implored them to vote for a hurricane relief bill that includes a short-term extension of the federal debt limit.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
